00054                     UINT8  m_lastlit8;
00055                     UINT16 m_lastlit16;
00056                 };

00059                 UINT8       m_buff[256]; 
00060                 UINT8       *m_buff_p;      // buffer for compression and pointer to actual position    (compression)
00061                 INT         m_prev;         // last character - used for comparison (compression)
00062                 INT         m_pcount;       // count of same characters (compression)
00063                 UINT        m_bindex;       // buffer index (compression)
00064                 UINT        m_bytes_left;   // bytes left that must be written in next run (compression)            
00065 
00066                 UINT        m_lit_bytes;    // how many lit bytes are left  (decompression)
00067                 UINT        m_fill_bytes;   // how many fill bytes are left (decompression)
00068                 const BinData* m_data;
00069                 UINT32      m_offset;
00070                 UINT32      m_idx;
